about_the_game:
It's July the 30th in Fred’s Cereal Company, a day that was supposed to be normal for all employees, but you made a dangerous decision, a decision to leave. It might seem dramatic, but I assure you, it's never been more serious, because leaving the FCC company is as hard as leaving a cult. Your final formal resignation letter was returned to you stamped with Fred’s refusal and because of that he put the company under complete shutdown. Find out what really went wrong... there's a big mistery to be unleashed.



Get ready for an exciting survival horror adventure with a hint of comedy in our immersive first-person game. Dive into an eerie world, solve challenging puzzles, and confront terrifying employees. Experience a captivating mix of suspenseful horror and dark humor that will make you hooked. Overcome tough challenges, face mysterious secrets, and get ready for a intense storyline. Immerse yourself in visually stunning environments that are fully detailed, making you want to check every corner, and captivating sounds for an unforgettable experience. Play as Madman, the sales multi millionaire who just wants to quit the damn company.

First-person perspective: See the world through the eyes of the main character.
Survival mechanics: Manage resources and navigate dangerous environments.
Horrifying encounters: Face terrifying employees and unravel their mysteries.
Puzzles and challenges: Engage in thought-provoking obstacles to progress.
Unique comedy elements: Experience dark humor and unexpected relief.
Engaging storyline: Uncover secrets and piece together the larger picture.
Stunning visuals and immersive audio: Immerse yourself in a detailed and atmospheric world.



Inventory: Quickly switch between items for optimal performance in challenging situations. Collect and manage items in a suitcase-style inventory, similar to popular games like Resident Evil and others.
Cranking Mechanic: Add depth and precision to combat with chargeable guns that require manual cranking, offering a unique and thrilling gameplay experience.
Vending Machines: Discover vending machines scattered throughout the company, offering a wide range of weapon options. Choose from melee, rifle, shotgun, sniper, bazooka, and grenades, allowing for diverse playstyles and exciting replayability.
NPC Interactions: Engage with various in-game characters who provide guidance and instructions to assist you on your journey.

AND MUCH MORE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 620 / AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

short_description: Step into a chaotic cereal company gone wrong. Your resignation is ready, your decision firm, but your boss won't let you leave. Encounter strange characters, fight colleagues, solve puzzles, and face unexpected challenges as you strive to quit.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
